about_the_game:
Master Piece is a deck-building roguelike game inspired from board games, offering simple yet deeply strategic gameplay. Recruit an expedition team of mercenaries, and embark on a journey to uncover the secrets of a world shrouded in dark mist.

Optimize your strategies, Deploy your mercenaries, and fight the battles to achieve victory. Strengthening and combining mercenaries’ unique traits are essential to creating powerful synergies and combinations, which will increase your chances of completing this perilous journey.

Combat

Deploy one mercenary unit per round to the battlefield and engage in combat. Once combat begins, mercenaries act in order based on their speed. Devise your best next move, given your current situation.

With simple controls and a straightforward system, anyone can easily fathom the basic mechanics of the game. However, mastering and optimizing the variable combinations of mercenary traits, relics, and commander’s abilities will demand a deep and complex understanding. Easy learning, but deep, challenging gameplay at the same time!

Strategic Combinations

Build your team of mercenaries, not cards. Mercenary units can be enhanced and modified in various ways along the journey, offering new strategic combinations every time you play.

Explore different journeys with 140+ mercenaries and traits, 80+ relics, and 400+ card events.

Discover diverse combinations, build support facilities in campsites, make the ultimate expedition team of your dream.

Every new game you play will be perceived differently from the previous experience, with diverse events and randomly generated paths & enemies. 120+ types of mercenaries, 60+ types of relics, 14+ types of building events, and 400+ card events will contribute to creating an infinitely replayable game.

Building Events

The various buildings in each region will grant your team the strength to face powerful foes. Recruit, enhance or dismiss mercenaries, and assign them with new traits.

Card Events

More than 400 card events each present a unique and concise storyline, offering players a variety of choices and corresponding consequences.
